|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [startTransfer(formData)](./sfapi.storageservice.starttransfer.md) |  | <p>Start Transfer Initiate a Globus transfer.</p><p>Before calling this method, make sure you have a valid \[globus token\](https://docs.nersc.gov/services/globus/\#generate-a-globus-token-for-use-at-nersc) and have activated the endpoints you want to use.</p><p>- \*\*source\*\*: source endpoint UUID - \*\*target\*\*: target endpoint UUID - \*\*outdir\*\*: target endpoint output directory - \*\*infile\*\*: file containing list of full path of input files - \*\*username\*\*: (optional) run this operation as another user (needs special permission)</p><p>You can use special UUID-s of "dtn", "hpss" or "cori".</p> |
